files.patch: @@ -121,1 +121,1 @@ - * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= size()) + * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range ({@code index < 0 || index >= size()}) @@ -134,1 +134,1 @@ - * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= size()) + * @throws IndexOutOfBoundsException if the index is out of range ({@code index < 0 || index >= size()}) @@ -157,1 +157,1 @@ - * (index < 0 || index >= getSource().size()) + * ({@code index < 0 || index >= getSource().size()})
